title: Quantum computers can Reverse BTC Keys!
message: A powerful quantum computer can reverse Bitcoin public keys into private keys from their public keys using Shor's algorithm

title: BTC Exposed Keys!
message: 36% of all BTC are on addresses with exposed public keys

title: BTC could be hacked in transit!
message: 100% of BTC addresses can be hacked during transactions by deriving the private key from the public key which is broadcast to the network using a quantum computer.

title: "But BTC can fork..."
message: Any Bitcoin soft-fork solution requires all users to actively participate in moving their funds to new qc-proof addresses.

title: "BTC can impliment larger Signatures for quantum resistance"
message: Increasing signature length is not a solution. Example, going 256 to 384 bit curves would mean a quantum computer with 3484 qubits instead of 2330 qubits could break the signature scheme...

title: "Quantum Computers are too far away..."
message: Some experts predict it will be a problem for Bitcoin’s digital signatures within the decade. Even pessimistic estimates put ‘Y2Q’ at around 30 years away.
